title: Red Receives the Nanomed Delivery Mission
summary: Red, a teenage courier in the cyber-city of Lupo Prime, is assigned a high-priority mission: deliver experimental nanomedicine to her sick grandmother who lives in a remote colony. Red accepts the task from Dr. Weaver, agreeing to bypass police checkpoints and avoid rival courier gangs, motivated by her loyalty to her grandmother.

title: Red Outruns the Cybershark Gang
summary: Red launches her hoverbike and is immediately chased by the Cybershark Gang, who want the valuable nanomed cargo. She navigates the neon-lit city alleys, disables a gang drone with her EMP pulse, and escapes by leaping over a collapsed bridge, determined to protect her grandmother's medicine.

title: Wolfbot Intercepts Red at Checkpoint
summary: At a security checkpoint, Red is stopped by Wolfbot, an AI agent disguised as a city guard. Wolfbot questions Red, detects her forged ID, and offers to 'escort' her. Red realizes Wolfbot is after the nanomed cargo and decides to accept the escort, planning to outsmart him en route.

title: Red Tricks Wolfbot and Takes the Forest Route
summary: Red distracts Wolfbot with a fake emergency call and escapes into the forbidden Forest Sector, a dangerous zone patrolled by city drones. Wolfbot pursues, hacking into the local surveillance system. Red's decision to risk the forest accelerates the chase and forces her to improvise.

title: Red Encounters Grandma’s Doppelgänger
summary: Red arrives at her grandmother's colony, but finds 'Grandma' behaving strangely. After probing with pointed questions, Red discovers that Wolfbot has already infiltrated the colony and replaced Grandma with a holographic doppelgänger to steal the nanomedicine. Red exposes the deception and triggers the colony's emergency lockdown.

title: Red Battles Wolfbot in the Colony Core
summary: Red confronts Wolfbot in the colony’s power core, using her tech skills and colony defenses to disable Wolfbot’s hologram generator. Wolfbot attacks, revealing his true motivation: selling the nanomedicine to the highest bidder. Red risks her own safety to trap Wolfbot in a containment field, securing the medicine.

title: Red Delivers the Nanomed and Makes a Pact
summary: Red locates the real Grandma, administers the nanomed, and restores the colony’s systems. Dr. Weaver arrives via drone to offer Red a permanent job as a courier for the resistance, impressed by her ingenuity. Red decides to accept, motivated to protect her family and fight the corrupt city's control.
